Package hu.bme.mit.theta.core.utils

Class VarIndexing

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.bme.mit.theta.core.utils.VarIndexing
  • public class VarIndexing
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents an immutable mapping, where each variable is associated with an index. The inner builder class can also be used to create a new instance.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes
